name: Nitro Kid
description:
Nitro Kid is a mix of ‘80s kung fu movies, cyberpunk and our passion for roguelikes.

In a dystopian neon Miami, megacorp INFINITY has secretly captured kids with special abilities to turn their powers into military products.
The goal? Save as many kids as you can and put INFINITY out of business!
KEY FEATURES

Grid-Based Combat:
Slide around enemies, find the best position for attack combo and use the environment to your advantage.

Progressive Deck Building:
Craft a deck of synergized abilities, kung fu moves and skills.
Alternate your strategy with card upgrades, game changing infusions and hero patches.

Roguelike Progression:
- 3 unlockable heroes
- 250+ cards
- Procedurally generated rooms and random events
- Every run offers a unique pathway through the levels of INFINITY tower

Synthwave Soundtrack:
30+ NEW tracks from the talented Synthwave artists made exclusively for the game. Try out the first ones in the DEMO!
Stay tuned for the full lineup announcement!
